articles.author: Michael Marot
articles.title: Indianapolis Colts’ music-loving owner Jim Irsay dies at age 65 - AP News
articles.description: Jim Irsay, the Indianapolis Colts’ owner who leveraged the popularity of Peyton Manning into a new stadium and a Super Bowl title, died Wednesday at age 65. Pete Ward, Irsay’s longtime right-hand man and the teams chief operating officer, made the announcemen…
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS (AP) Jim Irsay started his football career as a ball boy. He finished it as a team owner.
Along the way, the NFLs music man created his own, unique brand. 
Irsay worked his way up thro… [+8195 chars]
